reviews.content: Mac lipstick is absolutely amazing! The color is stunning and it has great coverage.
Unfortunately, it was very bad. The color fades quickly and it even caused irritation.
Mac lipstick is good, but it has an unpleasant smell. Not suitable for me.
It was excellent! Beautiful color, good coverage, and long-lasting. Very satisfied.
Not recommended at all. The color fades quickly and it's very sticky.
It's average. Beautiful color, but it has poor staying power and smudges easily.
It really disappointed me. Beautiful color, but it gets very dry and parches my lips.
It was okay. It has good coverage and the price is reasonable. But the color is a bit too dark for me.
Overall, it was decent. Beautiful color, but it feels too heavy and even feels on my lips.
It was a mixed experience. Initially, the color is beautiful, but later it fades quickly. Disappointing.
